```{r}
library(readr)
adult_train <- read.csv("./adult_train.csv", na.strings = "", sep = ";")
adult_train$Country = NULL
adult_train$fnlwgt = NULL

colnames(adult_train) <- tolower(colnames(adult_train))

write_csv(adult_train, file = "/Users/siyiwei/Desktop/mlr3fairness/data-raw/adult-train-raw.csv")
```

```{r}
supersub <- function(x){
  return(substr(x, 1, nchar(x)-1))
}
adult_test <- read.csv("./adult_test.csv", na.strings = "", sep = ";")
adult_test$Country = NULL
adult_test$fnlwgt = NULL
adult_test <- na.omit(adult_test)
colnames(adult_test) <- tolower(colnames(adult_test))
adult_test$target <- sapply(adult_test$target, supersub)

write_csv(adult_test, file = "/Users/siyiwei/Desktop/mlr3fairness/data-raw/adult-test-raw.csv")
```
